duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver Fire Protection Engineering subject matter expertise to DoD federal government, Military, and Intelligence Community partners.
Participate in the creation of design analyses, conceptual designs, program requirements, and system selection.
Collaborate in a design team environment, working with engineers, designers, and project managers.
Interface with mission partners, clients, and Authorities Having Jurisdiction (AHJ) to deliver key design efforts.
Receive mentorship from Mid-Level and Senior Professionals.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s or master’s degree in Fire Protection Engineering (ABET accredited)
